title: GraphQL Federation: The Missing API for Your Platform Strategy
author: Michelle Greer
description: There is often a lot of friction between the backend and the frontend that you can readily solve with GraphQL.
cntitle: GraphQL Federation：您平台战略中缺失的 API
cndescription: 后端和前端之间经常存在大量摩擦，而 GraphQL 可以轻松解决这些摩擦。
